au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.name: 0p15T_g4_4m_apx47_proposal888
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) #sics.drive('nvs_lambda', 5.0) # Drive detector to short position sics.set('/instrument/detector/detector_y/speed', 53) driveDet(3200,0) # Drive entrance aperture to 50 mm square driveEntRotAp(180) # Drive guide to g4 driveGuide(guideConfig.g4) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for guide g4) driveEntRotAp(180) #set sample ap to 7.5 mm sics.drive('apx', -47) # Drive beamstops up selBs(1) # set beamcentres sics.set('beamcenterx', 96.008) sics.set('beamcenterz', 94.906) sics.execute('OxfordSetRate 0.8') sics.execute('OxfordSetfield 0.15') sics.execute('broadcast ready') time.sleep(5) sics.execute('broadcast ready')
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(22, 100) # Drive attenuator to 300 driveAtt(270)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(270) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(22, 0) driveBsz(252)
